title: God’s Covenant with Abram
summary: Genesis 15 features a divine covenant where God promises Abram countless descendants and land. Abram believes God, and it’s credited to him as righteousness. God confirms His promise through a covenant ceremony.

faq.question: How did Abram respond to God’s promise?
faq.answer: He believed the Lord, and it was counted to him as righteousness.

faq.question: What was the covenant ceremony?
faq.answer: God passed through split animals, symbolizing His unbreakable promise to Abram.
